languages.text: "В этой стычке Глейто не показал и десятой доли того, на что способен". {n}Соломон треплет пса за холку.{/n} "Но он уверенно догоняет меня по числу убитых за сегодня еретиков".

"That skirmish just now? Glaito didn't even get to show off a tenth of what he is capable of." {n}Solomorne ruffles the dog's neck.{/n} "But he is quickly catching up with me for who's killed the most heretics today."
languages.original_text: "В этой стычке Глейто не показал и десятой доли того, на что способен". {n}Соломон треплет пса за холку.{/n} "Но он уверенно догоняет меня по числу убитых за сегодня еретиков".

traits.locale_text: "That skirmish just now? Glaito didn't even get to show off a tenth of what he is capable of." {n}Solomorne ruffles the dog's neck.{/n} "But he is quickly catching up with me for who's killed the most heretics today."

"That skirmish just now? Glaito didn't even get to show off a tenth of what he is capable of." {n}Solomorne ruffles the dog's neck.{/n} "But he is quickly catching up with me for who's killed the most heretics today."

"That skirmish just now? Glaito didn't even get to show off a tenth of what he is capable of." {n}Solomorne ruffles the dog's neck.{/n} "But he is quickly catching up with me for who's killed the most heretics today."

"That skirmish just now? Glaito didn't even get to show off a tenth of what he is capable of." {n}Solomorne ruffles the dog's neck.{/n} "But he is quickly catching up with me for who's killed the most heretics today."

"That skirmish just now? Glaito didn't even get to show off a tenth of what he is capable of." {n}Solomorne ruffles the dog's neck.{/n} "But he is quickly catching up with me for who's killed the most heretics today."

"That skirmish just now? Glaito didn't even get to show off a tenth of what he is capable of." {n}Solomorne ruffles the dog's neck.{/n} "But he is quickly catching up with me for who's killed the most heretics today."

languages.text: "Das Scharmützel eben? Glaito musste nicht einmal ein Zehntel dessen zeigen, wozu er in der Lage ist." {n}Solomorne krault den Nacken des Hundes.{/n} "Aber er holt rasch auf, wenn es darum geht, wer heute die meisten Ketzer getötet hat."
languages.original_text: "That skirmish just now? Glaito didn't even get to show off a tenth of what he is capable of." {n}Solomorne ruffles the dog's neck.{/n} "But he is quickly catching up with me for who's killed the most heretics today."

traits.locale_text: "Das Scharmützel eben? Glaito musste nicht einmal ein Zehntel dessen zeigen, wozu er in der Lage ist." {n}Solomorne krault den Nacken des Hundes.{/n} "Aber er holt rasch auf, wenn es darum geht, wer heute die meisten Ketzer getötet hat."

languages.text: « Vous parlez de cet accrochage ? Glaito n'a même pas fait montre d'un dixième de ce dont il est capable. {n}Solomorne ébouriffe le cou du chien.{/n} Mais il me rattrape rapidement en nombre d'hérétiques tués aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "That skirmish just now? Glaito didn't even get to show off a tenth of what he is capable of." {n}Solomorne ruffles the dog's neck.{/n} "But he is quickly catching up with me for who's killed the most heretics today."

traits.locale_text: « Vous parlez de cet accrochage ? Glaito n'a même pas fait montre d'un dixième de ce dont il est capable. {n}Solomorne ébouriffe le cou du chien.{/n} Mais il me rattrape rapidement en nombre d'hérétiques tués aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: «¿Cómo, en esa escaramuza? Glaito no ha demostrado ni una décima parte de lo que es capaz de hacer». {n}Solomorne acaricia el pescuezo del perro.{/n} «Pero va camino de haber matado hoy más herejes que yo mismo».
languages.original_text: "That skirmish just now? Glaito didn't even get to show off a tenth of what he is capable of." {n}Solomorne ruffles the dog's neck.{/n} "But he is quickly catching up with me for who's killed the most heretics today."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo, en esa escaramuza? Glaito no ha demostrado ni una décima parte de lo que es capaz de hacer». {n}Solomorne acaricia el pescuezo del perro.{/n} «Pero va camino de haber matado hoy más herejes que yo mismo».

languages.text: “是刚刚那场战斗吗？格雷托甚至连十分之一的能耐都没发挥出来呢。”{n}索罗蒙揉着格雷托的脖子。{/n}“我们正在比赛，看谁杀的异端分子最多，他的纪录很快就要追上我了。”
languages.original_text: "That skirmish just now? Glaito didn't even get to show off a tenth of what he is capable of." {n}Solomorne ruffles the dog's neck.{/n} "But he is quickly catching up with me for who's killed the most heretics today."

traits.locale_text: “是刚刚那场战斗吗？格雷托甚至连十分之一的能耐都没发挥出来呢。”{n}索罗蒙揉着格雷托的脖子。{/n}“我们正在比赛，看谁杀的异端分子最多，他的纪录很快就要追上我了。”

languages.text: 「さっきの小競り合いのことですか？グライトの実力は、十分の一も発揮されていませんでしたよ」{n}ソロモーンは犬の首元を軽くわしわしとかいた。{/n}「もっとも、今日の異端者討伐数では、彼はもう少しで私に並びそうでしたけどね」
languages.original_text: "That skirmish just now? Glaito didn't even get to show off a tenth of what he is capable of." {n}Solomorne ruffles the dog's neck.{/n} "But he is quickly catching up with me for who's killed the most heretics today."

traits.locale_text: 「さっきの小競り合いのことですか？グライトの実力は、十分の一も発揮されていませんでしたよ」{n}ソロモーンは犬の首元を軽くわしわしとかいた。{/n}「もっとも、今日の異端者討伐数では、彼はもう少しで私に並びそうでしたけどね」

languages.text: "Şimdiki çatışmayı mı diyorsunuz? Glaito, yapabileceklerinin onda birini bile gösterme gereği duymadı." {n}Solomorne, köpeğin boynunu kaşıyor.{/n} "Bugün en çok kâfir öldüren olarak bana yetişmek üzere."
languages.original_text: "That skirmish just now? Glaito didn't even get to show off a tenth of what he is capable of." {n}Solomorne ruffles the dog's neck.{/n} "But he is quickly catching up with me for who's killed the most heretics today."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdiki çatışmayı mı diyorsunuz? Glaito, yapabileceklerinin onda birini bile gösterme gereği duymadı." {n}Solomorne, köpeğin boynunu kaşıyor.{/n} "Bugün en çok kâfir öldüren olarak bana yetişmek üzere."

languages.original_text: "That skirmish just now? Glaito didn't even get to show off a tenth of what he is capable of." {n}Solomorne ruffles the dog's neck.{/n} "But he is quickly catching up with me for who's killed the most heretics today."
